product_name: Wolverine Hiking and Biking in the New River Gorge: A Trail User's Guide
long_description: A guide to 114 trails in the world-class recreational area in West Virginia,. Author: R. Bryan Simon. Softcover; 352 pages; color photographs and maps. Wolverine Publishing; copyright 2013. . 114 trail descriptions offer complete information including difficulty, distance, elevation gain, activities, location, suggested maps and options for longer and shorter hikes. Most hikes also include elevation profiles, topographic maps, and color photographs of sights along the trail. Measures approximately 8.5 x 5.5 in.
short_description: A guide to 114 trails in the world-class recreational area in West Virginia, Hiking and Biking in the New River Gorge: A Trail User's Guide offers all the details needed to plan a great trip.
